channel.title: CVE Feed for Walter Pinem -- WP MyLinks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Walter Pinem -- WP MyLinks

item.title: CVE-2024-47371|2024-10-07T13:15:06.648Z -- walter%20pinem -- wp%20mylinks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Walter Pinem WP MyLinks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP MyLinks: from n/a through 1.0.6.
